sentences.en: Digestion, of course , starts in Joe's mouth and stomach.
sentences.cn: 消化 当然 是从乔的口腔和胃开始的.

sentences.en: He had always an easy temper , a faultless digestion, and a rosy cheek.
sentences.cn: 他一向无忧无虑, 消化不错, 面色红润.

sentences.en: It improves digester cost operation and reduces capital cost wherever sludge digestion is utilized.
sentences.cn: 当采用污泥消化时,它可改进消化器的运行并降低其基建投资费用.

sentences.en: My digestion ain't so hot these days, either.
sentences.cn: 我的消化系统这几天也不怎么对劲儿。

sentences.en: My digestion has been poor since we left Marseilles.
sentences.cn: 自从我们离开马赛以来,我一直消化不良.

sentences.en: No liquids are served with meals because they interfere with digestion.
sentences.cn: 上饭菜时不要同时上汤水或饮品，因为这会影响消化。

sentences.en: Perhaps the simplest approach to extracellular digestion is that employed by saprophytes.
sentences.cn: 细胞外消化最简单途径也许是腐生生物所利用的方法.

sentences.en: Segregation of fatty material is a serious problem in anaerobic sludge digestion units.
sentences.cn: 厌氧污泥消化单元中脂肪物质的分离是个难题.

sentences.en: She has a weak [ good ] digestion.
The optimal conditions for the anaerobic digestion are the following.
sentences.cn: 厌气消化的最佳条件如下.

sentences.en: This food is easy of digestion.
This kind of tea acts as an aid to digestion.
This rich food is bad for your digestion.
sentences.cn: 这种油腻食物不利于你的消化.

sentences.en: Too much tea is bad for your digestion.
Wine or sugary drinks inhibit digestion.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒或含糖饮料抑制消化。

words.tran_cn: 做摘要者；助消化食品；汇编者；蒸炼器
